i1.name: Fury of the North
description: {{sbc|Innate - Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' receives [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' if she hasn't taken damage from [[monster]]s or enemy [[champion]]s in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.

[[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' engulfs {{ui|Bristle}} in True Ice, granting '''Sejuani''' {{tip|slow-immune|slow immunity}}, {{tip|cripple-immune|cripple immunity}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}}, and {{sti|mr|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' are ''Frozen''. '''Sejuani's''' [[basic attacks]] and [[champion ability|abilities]] against ''Frozen'' enemies consume the effect to deal {{as|10% of their {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani receives File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png Frost Armor if she hasn't taken damage from monsters or enemy champions in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png Frost Armor engulfs Bristle in True Ice, granting Sejuani slow immunity, cripple immunity, 10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and 10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies stunned by Sejuani are Frozen. Sejuani's basic attacks and champion ability against Frozen enemies consume the effect to deal 10% of their maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
i1.notes:
* Gaining ''Frost Armor'' does not remove any pre-existing {{tip|slow|slows}} or {{tip|cripple|cripples}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Icebreaker's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects via basic attack.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Spell shield}} interaction with ''Icebreaker''.

q1.name: Arctic Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' signals {{ui|Bristle}} to {{tip|dash}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
'''Sejuani''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Arctic Assault''.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sejuani signals Bristle to dash to the target location, dealing magic damage and knocking up all enemies hit for 0.5 seconds. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy champion.Sejuani can cast any of her champion ability during Arctic Assault.
q1.notes:
* Champions will slightly be {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, while [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s will instead be slightly {{tip|airborne|pulled}} for a fixed distance.
* ''Arctic Assault'' cannot {{tip|airborne|knock}} enemies over terrain.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Arctic Assault'' will end the dash and affect enemies at the new location.

w1.name: Winter's Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds into the cast time, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} {{tip|minion|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

She then lashes out with her flail after the remaining {{fd|0.75}} seconds of the cast time in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
'''Sejuani''' can move freely during ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit and knocking back minions and monsters.She then lashes out with her flail after the remaining 0.75 seconds of the cast time in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional physical damage and slowing all enemies hit by 75% for 0.25 seconds.Sejuani can move freely during Winter's Wrath. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow Sejuani's movement.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}

{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|5.25}}% of her '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|7.25}}% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.

e1.name: Permafrost
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and {{tt|nearby|1100 range}} allied {{tip|melee}} champions' basic attacks apply ''Frost'' to enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, epic, large and medium monsters, {{ui|Blue Siege Minion|link=Siege minion|siege minions}} and {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link=Super minion|super minions}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks from them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' encases the {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy with 4 stacks of ''Frost'' closest to the cursor in ice, consuming all stacks to deal {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knock them down}}, and {{tip|stun}} them for 1 second.
Enemy champions {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' cannot gain ''Frost'' for 8 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied melee champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, epic, large and medium monsters, siege minions and super minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks from them.Active: Sejuani encases the visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor in ice, consuming all stacks to deal magic damage, knock them down, and stun them for 1 second.Enemy champions stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for 8 seconds.Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
e1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Permafrost's'' stack application interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

r1.name: Glacial Prison
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws an ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}}, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 1 second.

The bola deals increased damage, {{tip|stun|stuns}} and {{tip|sight|reveals}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with an enemy champion beyond {{tt|400 range|estimated}}, creating a frost storm for 2 seconds which forms a glacier on the ground that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within by 30% and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area in a smaller radius.
At the end of the duration, the glacier breaks, dealing the same damage and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies by 80% for 1 second as well as briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} them and the area.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage, stunning, and revealing them for 1 second.The bola deals increased damage, stuns and reveals for 1.5 seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with an enemy champion beyond 400 range, creating a frost storm for 2 seconds which forms a glacier on the ground that slows enemies within by 30% and grants sight of the area in a smaller radius.At the end of the duration, the glacier breaks, dealing the same damage and slowing enemies by 80% for 1 second as well as briefly revealing them and the area.The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 175}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Empowered Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets in the ice storm.
* ''Glacial Prison'' affects minions only if they are within detonation radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* The bola is always thrown at maximum range.
* The bola does not collide with terrain.
* ''Glacial Prison'' will cast from wherever '''Sejuani''' is at the end of the cast time.
